name: SnowPole Madness
description:
Hey everyone! Happy New Year!

I was expecting to release this project before Hollidays in my country,but was busy with work sooo...release it after anyway?  :D

In this small game you try to stop hungry elfs from stealing sweets!

Upgrade you skills from level to level and try to get all achivements(9 total!).

Where is no end in this one,but do you best to get as much scoring points as possible.

Controls PC - Move(A,D or Left,Right),Use TimeLock(SHIFT,2,T),USE Bombs(1,SPACE,G).You can also move by tiping a screen sides.

Controls Android - Just tap sides on screen to move and use buttons to activate abilities.

Game keep track of you achivements and hiscores,show them champ!
